definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tag @a[tag=LOTW-ally,tag=!LOTW-user] add LOTW-basicspell6tag</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["LOTW-ally"],NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b,Marker:1b,CustomName:'{"text":"LOTW-basicspell6"}'}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["LOTW-ally"],NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b,Marker:1b,CustomName:'{"text":"LOTW-basicspell6block"}'}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">playsound minecraft:entity.villager.work_librarian ambient @a[distance=..100] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 0.025</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">BasicSpell6tick</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
